item.title: 全球市场崩溃加深，大宗商品面临危机蔓延
item.description: 随着全球金融市场崩溃范围的扩大，从铜、黄金到原油等大宗商品暴跌，交易员们急于从获利交易中套现，并在整个工业原材料市场重新押注看跌。【原文：Commodities from copper and gold to crude oil plunged as a global meltdown in financial markets broadened, with traders rushing to cash out of profitable trades and place fresh bearish bets across industrial raw-material markets.】

item.title: 施瓦布和富达交易员报告股票暴跌期间出现故障
item.description: 嘉信理财公司（Charles Schwab Corp.【原文：Charles Schwab Corp. and other retail brokerage users reported outages as a global stocks selloff surged when trading in the US market opened on Monday.】

item.title: 比特币和以太币 ETF 在全球股市下跌中受到冲击
item.description: 在全球股市大跌的背景下，比特币和以太币这两种全球最大的加密货币跌至几个月来的最低价格水平，投资者纷纷抛售比特币和以太币交易所交易基金的股票。【原文：Investors dumped shares of Bitcoin and Ether exchange-traded funds in droves as the world’s two largest cryptocurrencies plunged to their lowest price levels in months amid a global equity selloff.】

item.title: TPG 直接借贷部门为第五期基金募集 39 亿美元资金
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，TPG 公司旗下的双溪资本合伙公司（Twin Brook Capital Partners）完成了其第五只直接借贷基金的募集，资本承诺总额达 39 亿美元，超过了 30 亿美元的目标。【原文：TPG Inc.’s Twin Brook Capital Partners closed its fifth direct lending fund with $3.9 billion of aggregate capital commitments, surpassing a $3 billion target, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 恒大向创始人许家印等追讨 60 亿美元
item.description: 中国恒大集团及其清算人正寻求从包括该开发商创始人许家印在内的七名被告处追回 60 亿美元的股息和报酬。【原文：China Evergrande Group and its liquidators are seeking to recover $6 billion in dividends and remuneration from seven defendants including the developer’s founder Hui Ka Yan.】

item.title: 市场下滑，现金涌出跨商品ETF
item.description: 上周，投资者从基础广泛的大宗商品交易所交易基金（ETF）中撤资超过 8 亿美元，在对世界两大经济体健康状况的担忧中，投资者减少了对原材料价格的押注。【原文：Investors pulled more than $800 million from broad-based commodity ETFs last week, dialing back bets on raw materials prices amid concerns about the health of the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 欧元升至七个月高点，美联储降息呼声渐高
item.description: 欧元攀升至七个月来的最强水平，因为有迹象表明美国经济比之前想象的要疲软得多，这增强了对美联储降息的押注，从而降低了美元的吸引力。【原文：The euro climbed to the strongest level in seven months as signs the US economy is much weaker than previously thought bolstered bets on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts, reducing the attractiveness of the dollar.】

item.title: 摩根大通交易平台称 "接近 "逢低买入机会
item.description: 随着周一全球股市下挫加剧，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：As the selloff in global stocks intensified Monday, JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s trading desk said the rotation out of the technology sector might be “mostly done” and the market is “getting close” to a tactical opportunity to buy the dip.】

item.title: 美国两年期收益率自 2022 年 7 月以来首次低于 10 年期收益率
item.description: 美国两年期收益率自 2022 年 7 月以来首次低于 10 年期收益率，原因是对经济衰退的担忧导致交易商押注美联储将大幅放宽货币政策。【原文：The US two-year yield became lower than the 10-year yield the first time since July 2022 as fears of an economic downturn led traders to bet on sharp monetary policy easing by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 瑞士在刑事调查中勒令 Glencore 支付 1.5 亿美元
item.description: 瑞士检察官在结束对该案长达四年的调查时表示，Glencore Plc 因未能采取足够措施防止在收购刚果民主共和国矿业资产过程中出现贿赂行为而被勒令支付 1.5 亿美元。【原文：Glencore Plc was ordered to pay $150 million for failing to take sufficient measures to prevent bribery over its acquisition of mining assets in the Democratic Republic of Congo, Swiss prosecutors said as they closed a four-year investigation into the case.】

item.title: 父女王朝在得克萨斯州石油和政治中崭露头角
item.description:
汤姆和克里斯蒂-克拉迪克（Christi Craddick）在能源行业具有影响力，同时也拥有自己的一份事业。【原文：

item.title: 华尔街熊市警告经济放缓给股市带来风险
item.description: 美股暴跌为华尔街一些最著名的看跌者平反，他们加倍警告经济放缓带来的风险。【原文：The US stock plunge is vindicating some of Wall Street’s most prominent bears, who are doubling down with warnings about risks from an economic slowdown.】

item.description:

item.title: 大陆集团考虑分拆汽车零部件和轮胎业务
item.description: 德国大陆集团（Continental AG）正在考虑将其陷入困境的汽车业务分拆上市，以便将其与这家德国零部件制造商更为成功的轮胎业务分离开来。【原文：Continental AG is considering spinning off and listing its struggling automotive business to separate it from the German parts maker’s more successful tires operations.】

item.title: 凯易聘请莱森律师事务所 M&A 合伙人 Larisch 在德国开展工作
item.description: Kirkland & Ellis LLP 已挖走 Latham & Watkins LLP 合伙人 Tobias Larisch，该律师事务所将在金融之都法兰克福设立新办事处，以扩大其在德国的业务范围。【原文：Kirkland & Ellis LLP has poached Latham & Watkins LLP partner Tobias Larisch, as the law firm expands its German footprint with a new office in the financial capital of Frankfurt.】

item.title: 全球股市大跌，原糖跌至 2022 年以来最低点
item.description: 受全球市场大跌影响，原糖跌至近两年来的最低点，而巴西强劲的装运量和印度产量增加的前景提振了供应前景。【原文：Raw sugar fell to the lowest in nearly two years weighed by a selloff in the broader global markets while strong Brazilian shipments and the prospects of higher output in India boost the supply outlook.】

item.title: 受新用户和一次性收益推动，巴蒂公司利润超出预期
item.description: Bharti Airtel Ltd. 公布的季度利润高于预期，原因是在非洲业务经历了一年的汇兑损失后，新增用户和一次性收益支撑了印度第二大无线运营商的业绩。【原文：Bharti Airtel Ltd. reported a larger-than-expected quarterly profit as newly added users and one-time gains bolstered India’s No. 2 wireless carrier after a year of foreign exchange pain in its Africa business.】

item.title: 哈格里夫斯将CVC和ADIA要约收购截止日期延至8月9日
item.description: Hargreaves Lansdown Plc 的私募股权收购方现在有时间在 8 月 9 日前对这家英国最大的零售投资平台提出明确的收购要约。【原文：Hargreaves Lansdown Plc’s private equity suitors now have time until Aug. 9 to make a firm offer for the UK’s largest retail investment platform.】

item.title: 惠誉将肯尼亚信用评级下调至 "垃圾 "级，肯尼亚债券下跌
item.description: 在惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）因预算风险将肯尼亚信用评级进一步下调至垃圾级后，肯尼亚美元债券价格下跌。【原文：Kenyan dollar-bond prices dropped after Fitch Ratings downgraded the country’s credit score further into junk territory because of budget risks.】

item.title: 中国住房困境持续，碧桂园销售额下降 72
item.description: 碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co., Ltd.）的销售下滑在上个月仍在持续，使这家试图避免破产清算的中国开发商雪上加霜。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co.’s sales slump dragged on last month, adding to the Chinese developer’s woes as it tries to avoid liquidation.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。全球股市下跌，美国股市收红，科技股领跌加速。与此同时，对美国经济的担忧加剧了人们对美联储何时降息的猜测。玛氏公司正在考虑在零食行业进行一项重大交易。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Global stocks are falling with US futures in the red as a tech-led selloff accelerates. Meanwhile, concerns about the US economy are fueling speculation as to when the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates. And Mars is considering making a major deal in the snack industry. Here’s what traders are talking about. — Morwenna Coniam.】

item.title: 分析师如何看待日本股市下跌的卖方和触发因素
item.description: 日本股市创下了自 1987 年以来最糟糕的一天，Topix 指数和日经 225 平均指数都进入了熊市，因为投资者在日元飙升、货币政策收紧和美国经济担忧的影响下纷纷出逃。【原文：Japanese stocks had their worst day since 1987, with both the Topix index and the Nikkei 225 Stock Average entering bear markets as investors fled amid a surge in the yen, tighter monetary policy and US economic concerns.】

item.title: 中国国有银行抛售政府债券，拉高收益率
item.description: 据交易员称，中国国有银行大量出售政府债券，此举有助于将基准收益率从历史低点拉高。【原文：China’s state banks sold government bonds in large batches, a move that helped to pull benchmark yields higher from record lows, according to traders.】

item.title: ICE 拒绝将欧盟债券纳入主权指数的建议
item.description: 洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange Inc）拒绝了将欧盟发行的债务纳入其政府债券基准的提议，这是对该集团吸引更多投资者的努力的最新打击。【原文：Intercontinental Exchange Inc. rejected a proposal to include debt issued by the European Union in its government bond benchmarks, the latest blow to the bloc’s quest to attract a larger pool of investors.】

item.title: 韦丹塔计划进行债务再融资以降低升级后的融资成本
item.description: 韦丹塔资源有限公司（Vedanta Resources Ltd.）正在寻求对其高收益债务进行部分再融资，因为该矿业公司希望在评级上调后降低融资成本。【原文：Vedanta Resources Ltd. is looking to partly refinance its high-yield debt as the miner aims to lower its funding costs following a rating upgrade.】

item.title: 诺和诺德公司所有人表示，英国必须修复国民医疗保健系统，才能保持生命科学领域的领先地位
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）控股股东的首席执行官警告说，如果不解决国民健康服务中存在的重大问题，英国就有可能在生命科学领域失去一席之地。【原文：The UK risks losing ground in life sciences if it doesn’t fix significant problems in the National Health Service, the chief executive officer of Novo Nordisk A/S’s controlling shareholder has warned.】

item.title: 疫苗销售受挫，生物技术公司亏损超出预期
item.description: BioNTech SE 公布的季度亏损幅度大于分析师的预期，原因是对 Covid-19 疫苗的需求低迷，以及开发新产品的支出增加。【原文：BioNTech SE posted a quarterly loss that was wider than analysts foresaw amid low demand for Covid-19 vaccines and increased spending on developing new products.】

item.title: 媒体报道称越南前刚果解放阵线主席因股票案被判入狱 21 年
item.description: 据新闻网站 Thanh Nien 报道，前房地产大亨 Trinh Van Quyet 因操纵股票和欺诈性侵占资产罪被判处 21 年监禁。【原文：Former real estate tycoon Trinh Van Quyet was sentenced to 21 years in prison after being found guilty of stock manipulation and fraudulent appropriation of assets, news website Thanh Nien reported.】
